message.body: Hey! Are you free Friday ??
Hi!! Yes I believe I am!!
Yes!!! Yoga and dinner date?!? I haven't been to yoga in AGES and
my body is definitely feeling it
Yes that sounds PERFECT!! I actually haven't gone since March--work has been eating me alive!!
Sounds like it's a much needed date - for both yoga and finally being able to see you!
Agreed! It's been far too long since either of those things happened!!
How are you holding up my dear? I know if Dan were in Boston right now I'd be at least mildly freaking out...
Hi love! Fortunately Jamie left as soon as he could and headed to New Canaan so I'm so happy he's safe. He lives 4 blocks from the explosions so I was fr
eaking out on Monday. This is all too much. My heart breaks for the city of Boston
Good I'm so glad he got out of there!!! And I know, I still just can't even wrap my head around it...
I kid you not I watched puppies videos for a good 20 minutes yesterday to escape. I don't understand how people can have so much hate in their hearts
It blows my mind...I find that stuffonmyrabbit.tumblr.com helps as well...
Leaving work now!!
Same! What a day...so glad we're doing this!!
Me too! If you can, save me a spot? If not, no worries
Yes I'll do my best and aim for the back! :-)
Thank you!
Center back, by the door to the bathroom!
Thank you!!
